body:
Hello everyone. I hate to interrupt, but I got something to say. I played on this server for 30+ months. I can still play on Avicus, even if I am always here to be online (but not always!). It was because of all the skills, meeting any players, destroying enemies, and gaining so many friends! I was so happy! You can still see me in the future. Thank you so much!

Remember: This is not a leaving post! 
                                                                                                                                                                   -MadTheGamer

title: 30+ months of gameplay (MadTheGamer)
